hero.title: Transform Your Payment Experience
hero.subtitle: Secure, fast, and reliable payment processing for businesses across Ethiopia. Join thousands of merchants who trust Chapa PSP for their payment needs.

features.title: Comprehensive Payment Solutions for Every Role
features.subtitle: From basic payment processing to advanced system management, our platform adapts to your needs with role-based functionality.

payment_processing.title: Secure Payment Processing
payment_processing.description: Process payments safely with end-to-end encryption and fraud detection.

transaction_history.title: Transaction Analytics
transaction_history.description: Track and analyze your payment history with detailed reports and insights.

mobile_payments.title: Mobile Payment Solutions
mobile_payments.description: Accept payments from mobile money services and digital wallets seamlessly.

user_management.title: User Management
user_management.description: Manage user accounts, permissions, and access levels across your organization.

analytics_reports.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics_reports.description: Generate comprehensive reports and gain insights into payment trends.

security_monitoring.title: Security Monitoring
security_monitoring.description: Monitor system security, detect anomalies, and prevent fraudulent activities.

system_configuration.title: System Configuration
system_configuration.description: Configure platform settings, payment methods, and integration parameters.

database_management.title: Database Management
database_management.description: Manage system data, backups, and database optimization for peak performance.

global_settings.title: Global Platform Settings
global_settings.description: Control platform-wide configurations, policies, and administrative functions.

contact.subtitle: Have questions about our payment solutions? Our team is here to help you succeed.
